Title: Relates to the sealing of certain claims against law enforcement officers
Summary: Provides for the sealing of unfounded, exonerated, and pending claims made against law enforcement officers; requires such claims to be redacted from disciplinary records.
LawCode: Add ยง845-f, Exec L; amd ยง89, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public officers law, in relation to the sealing of certain claims against law enforcement officers
